ComicInfo.Title: The Spirit is Willing
ComicInfo.Summary:
A while after Ghost Rider comes back to life, he goes back to Cypress Hills reflecting on the origin on how he came to be with all the villains he fought and the death of Barbara.
Meanwhile a super strong man named Slaughter boys kills a foreign couple in an alley. He later attacks a group of Cops.
Back as Dan Ketch, He gets a visit from his friend Jack and tells his mom how much she means to him even though he is adopted. He then meets up with Stacy but there meeting is stopped by a call to Stacy about Slaughter Boy attacking the cops.
Slaughter Boy almost kills officer ski but is stopped by Ghost Rider. Both get into a brutal Brawl in which Slaughter Boy almost gets the upper hand until Ghost Rider attacks Slaughter Boy with the Penance Stare. This defeats Slaughter Boy for good and Ghost Rider leaves Stacy at the scene telling her Dan has not control of what he does. This worries Stacy.
